channel.title: Transcriptomics on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in Transcriptomics on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 7: Understanding FASTQ vs. FASTA Files
item.description: Learn the key differences between FASTQ and FASTA files in RNA-Seq analysis, from raw reads to reference sequences. Understand their roles in quality control, alignment, and data preprocessing.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 6: From BAM to Count Matrices with featureCounts & HTSeq
item.description: Generate RNA-Seq count matrices with featureCounts and HTSeq. Learn about annotation matching, strandedness, sorting, and best practices for accurate read quantification.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 5: Read Alignment with STAR, HISAT2 & Minimap2
item.description: Explore how to align RNA-Seq reads using STAR, HISAT2, and Minimap2. Understand the key features, commands, and strengths of each tool in transcriptomic workflows.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 4: Read Trimming & Filtering with Trimmomatic
item.description: Master read trimming in RNA-Seq using Trimmomatic. Discover essential options, command examples, and how trimming enhances read quality before alignment.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 3: Quality Control with FastQC & MultiQC
item.description: Master quality control in bulk RNA-Seq analysis with FastQC and MultiQC. Learn how to assess sequencing read quality, identify adapter contamination, and interpret QC reports.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 2: Understanding RNA-Seq Reads & FASTQ Files
item.description: Learn about RNA-Seq reads, the FASTQ format, quality scores, and preprocessing strategies for high-quality sequencing data analysis.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 1: Introduction to Bulk RNA-Seq Analysis
item.description: Explore the fundamentals of bulk RNA-Seq analysis, from FASTQ files to differential gene expression. Learn about the tools and methods that drive transcriptomic research.
